summary: For the hunter at heart, adds value to all the pelts and tusks you accumulate on your hunting trips and adventures across Skyrim!
descriptionHtml:
For the hunter at heart, adds value to all the pelts and tusks you accumulate on your hunting trips and adventures across Skyrim!

[url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=13333]It\'s on the Steam Workshop too![/url]

Here is a list of all changed prices for your convenience

Please tell me if I am missing any and any other criticism is greatly appreciated!

Mammoth Tusk - 750
Snow Sabre Cat Pelt - 575
Werewolf Pelt - 500
Sabre Cat Pelt - 470
Snow Bear Pelt - 400
Cave Bear Pelt - 325
Horse Hide - 325
Horker Tusk - 300
Bear Pelt - 275
Deer Hide - 225
Ice Wolf Pelt - 225
Cow Hide - 200
Snow Fox Pelt - 150
Wolf Pelt - 150
Fox Pelt - 100
Goat Hide - 100

*Update 1.1*

Added all the possible drops for the animals, list of prices below. Cooking increases the value of the product so it would be a good idea to cook it before you sell it.

Next Update (very soon) will have the option to treat the hides and pelts you get to make them more valuable. Will add the option to make rugs from these soon after.

Mammoth Snout - 40
Mammoth Steak - 55
Eye Of Sabrecat - 40
Sabrecat Tooth - 100
Bear Claws - 100
Horse Meat - 40
Horse Haunch - 55
Horker Meat - 40
Horker Loaf - 55
Large Antlers - 225
Small Antlers - 175
Venison - 40
Venison Chop - 55
Vanison Stew - 60
Raw Beef - 40
Cooked Beef - 55
Beef Stew - 60
Leg of Goat - 40
Leg of Goat Roast - 55

*Update 1.2*

Ok, I added treated versions of all the available hides, go to a tanning rack with an untreated hide and a salt pile and you will be able to make a \'treated\' version that hide, in the next update, (tomorrow), you will be able to use the treated hides to make fine rugs to sell for even more profit. After that, extra drop items! 
(like the much needed mammoth hide) 

as always, he is a list of the updated values for your convenience : -

Treated Cave Bear Pelt - 375
Treated Bear Pelt - 325
Treated Snow Bear Pelt - 450
Treated Cow Hide - 250
Treated Deer Hide - 275
Treated Fox Pelt - 150
Treated Snow Fox Pelt - 200
Treated Goat Hide - 150
Treated Horse Hide - 375
Treated Sabre Cat Pelt - 520
Treated Snow Sabre Cat Pelt - 625
Treated Werewolf Pelt - 550
Treated Ice Wolf Pelt - 275
Treated Wolf Pelt -200
author: Cole Reynolds
